altTitles.ja: ケンガンオメガ

description.en: Sequel to Kengan Asura. Takes place 2 years after the tournament.

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5224841), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8391174)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8443269), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794421)

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

description.id:
Duke si raja dingin tiba-tiba dihadapkan dengan Rinha, aktris top dari dunia lain. Ingin kembali ke dunianya, Rinha mengajukan perjanjian hubungan dengan sang raja. Terjebak di hubungan sandiwara, apa rasanya ya jadi pendamping Duke dari Utara di dunia yang tak dikenal?

---

description.ko:
“내 애인인 척 사교계에 들어가.” 
전 세계에서 주목하는 톱스타, 셀리나는 
촬영 중 갑작스러운 사고로 북부 공작의 땅에 차원 이동한다. 
마수에게서 목숨을 구해준 북부 공작, 칼시온은 
셀리나에게 자신의 애인인 척 사교계에 들어가 
정보를 입수하라는 계약을 제시하는데..

---

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

---

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5224841), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8391174)

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

---

description.zh:
掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

---

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

description.zh-hk:
兼具美貌與演技、獲獎無數的頂級演員薛璘夏在一場拍攝中發生意外，並因此掉入另一個陌生次元，正當她遭遇魔獸襲擊時，伊克萊茵王國的北方公爵凱爾希溫救下了她，意外相遇的兩人也就此達成了一樁祕密交易。

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

title.en: Blue Archive: Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

altTitles.ja: 100万ウォンのロマンス

description.en: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

"You may lie with me, human."
On the day of his new vet clinic's opening, Jung finds a sickly lizard at his doorstep. But the lizard soon turns into a human... and it turns out he's the Dragon King's son! Can the arrogant yet sexy Prince Woonwoo convince Jung to help him become a full-fledged dragon through intimacy?
description.es: El veterinario Choe Jeong finalmente hizo realidad su sueño al abrir su propio hospital para mascotas. En el primer día de apertura, Choe Jeong recogió un lagarto fuera de su puerta … "Soy el hijo menor del Rey Dragón". El lagarto … ¿se ha convertido en humano? ¿Y sigue diciendo que es el hijo del Rey Dragón? "¿Quieres ser mi príncipe?" ¿Qué le dirá Choe Jeong a este misterioso príncipe?

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界 屍山血河舞台 下総国 英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai: Shizan Ketsuga Butai, Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng III – Vũ Đài Núi Thây Sông Máu – Trận Chiến Thứ Bảy Ở Shimosha

description.en:
Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

description.en: A series of slice-of-life 4koma strips featuring the characters from the popular mobile game Twisted Wonderland.

title.en: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Octavinelle~

altTitles.ja: ディズニー ツイステッドワンダーランド THE COMIC ～EPISODE of OCTAVINELLE～

title.en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 推しの美少女に告白される話

altTitles.en: I was Confessed to by my Beautiful Oshi

description.en: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
description.ja: 推しの美少女に告白されて恋人になるラブコメ百合漫画です。
description.pt-br: Um romcom yuri onde uma estrela se confessa e vira uma namorada.

altTitles.ja: くノ一桃果食べごろです?

altTitles.en: Kunoichi Momoka is Ready to Eat?

description.en:
"Shinoburu Ninja School" is a place where young people who aspire to become ninja gather. Momoka entered the school, yearning to become a cool ninja who helps people with sword and ninjutsu. However, in addition to those classes, the school also teaches erotic skills to help them become true kunoichi. That may just be too stimulating for Momoka, who is inexperienced in sexual matters...!

Will she and her fellow ninja trainees make it through the obscene class and become the cool kunoichi she aimed to be? Or will she become that other kind of female ninja?!!!!?

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63779)

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

There is also an alternative version:
[A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e/a-parallel-world-with-a-1-39-male-to-female-ratio-is-unexpectedly-normal-r18)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: Who Saw the Peacock Dance in the Jungle?

altTitles.ja: クジャクのダンス、誰が見た？

altTitles.ja-ro: Kujaku no Dance, Dare ga Mita?

altTitles.en: Who saw the peacock dance in the jungle?

altTitles.vi: Là ai đã chứng kiến điệu múa khổng tước?

description.en:
A former cop was murdered on a snowy Christmas Eve night. The suspect was arrested & the case appeared to be closed.

However, a letter left by the murdered former cop to his daughter sets the case back on track. It said, "If any of the following persons are arrested or prosecuted...they are falsely accused." And on that list was the name of the suspect who was arrested for killing her father...

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

altTitles.ja: 告白シリーズ

description.en: Cute Short Stories of Confession of Lovee!!
description.fr: De jolies petites histoires de confessions d'amour !
description.pt-br: Coletânea de histórias curtas sobre declarações de amor.

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

altTitles.ja: 回復職の悪役令嬢

description.en: Charlotte discovered that she was in the game world she played in her previous life when her engagement was broken off. With her cheat knowledge, she escapes from the scenario and changes her job to a <healer> in the enemy country, and enjoys a free adventurous life!
description.id: Ketika pertunangannya diputus, Charlotte menyadari bahwa dia berada di dunia game yang dia mainkan di kehidupan sebelumnya. Dengan pengetahuan cheatnya, dia melarikan diri dari skenario cerita dan mengubah pekerjaannya menjadi <Penyembuh> di negara musuh, dan menikmati kehidupan petualangan yang bebas!
description.ja: 婚約破棄されたことをきっかけに、ここが前世でプレイしていたゲーム世界だと気づいたシャーロット。チート知識でシナリオ脱出＆敵国で＜癒し手＞にジョブチェンジして、自由な冒険ライフを堪能します！

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: あまあま

description.en: Yuji's girlfriend Misaki may seem hard and cold on the outside, but inside she's actually soft and loving. As they prepare for their high school entrance exams, Misaki decides that they should temporarily cut off all their dating activities. Will they be able to study hard enough through this period to get into the same high school?

altTitles.ja: すだちの魔王城

description.en: The hero defeated the Demon King and the world became peaceful-despite the fact that the boy in Saisho village, Murabito, was in trouble. Because it's too peaceful for his tool shop to have any customers! If nothing is done, the store will be closed ... What is the identity of the girl who appeared at that time ...!?
description.ja: 勇者が魔王を倒し、世界は平和になった――にもかかわらず、道具屋・すだち屋を営むムラビトは困っていた。平和すぎてお客さんが全然来ないのである！ このままでは閉店まっしぐら‥‥ そんな時に現れた少女の正体は、死んだはずの魔王で‥！？

altTitles.ja: おそとごはんをご一緒に

altTitles.zh: 邀你一起在户外共进美餐

altTitles.id: Ayo makan di Luar ruangan bersama

description.ja:
アパートの狭いキッチンに悩む料理好きの女子大生・風香が出会ったのは、料理が苦手で破天荒なアウトドア女子・よもぎだった。
成り行きで始まったたふたりのおそとごはんは、なんだかとっても温かくて…
女ふたりの助け合いアウトドアグルメ漫画スタート！

description.en: The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: 巨人の星

description.en:
**"Hyuma, be a big giant star!"**

This is the story of Hyuma Hoshi , a hot-blooded boy who endures intense, bloody training in response to his father's wish!

Adapted into Anime twice once in 1968, lasting 182 episodes and again in 1977(As Shin Star of the Giants with a follow-up), lasting a total of 75 episodes. Numerous Anime films were also produced as well as an OVA featuring a crossover with Tezuka's Atom, directed by Gundam's Yoshiyuki Tomino.

---
- **Won the 8th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1967**

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: フライト

description.en:
"I only have manga."

In 1965, still a high school student, Tsurita made her debut as the first newcomer of the newly published Garo. Through her science fiction shorts, she delved into surrealism, capturing the zeitgeist of the 1960s, before later succumbing to the incurable disease SLE (Systemic Lupus Erythematosus). This work contains Tsurita's works from her debut to the last years of her life as well as a detailed chronology of her life, with a "Kuniko Tsurita Yearbook" at the end.

(Source: Seirin Kogeisha)

Included Stories:
1. Hitobito no Maisou (人々の埋葬)
2. Kamigami no Hanashi (神々の話)
3. Nonsense (ナンセンス, Nonsense, 1966-10)
4. Onna (女, Woman, 1966-11)
5. Konna wa (こんな話)
6. Anti (アンチ, Anti, 1967-02)
7. Ikiru Tame no Tousou (生きるための闘争)
8. Agaki (あがき)
9. Jin Roku (ジンロク, Mr. Jin Roku, 1967-07)
10. Rokunomiya Himeko no Higeki (六の宮姫子の悲劇, The Tragedy Of Princess Rokunomiya, 1967-08)
11. Eikou e no Dasshutsu (栄光への脱出)
12. Kyoujin Nikki (狂人日記)
13. Madame Haruko (マダム･ハルコ)
14. Oto (音, Sounds, 1969-03)
15. Aru Kame no Hanashi (ある亀の話)
16. Sainan (災難, Calamity, 1970-07)
17. 65121320262719 (previously unpublished, 1970)
18. Boku no Tsuma wa Acrobat wo Yatteiru (僕の妻はアクロバットをやっている, My Wife Is An Acrobat, 1974-04)
19. Yuko no Hibi (憂子の日々, Yuko's Days, 1974-10)
20. Sora wa Aozora Kumo Hitotsu (空は青空雲一つ, The Sky Is Blue With A Single Cloud, 1974-11)
21. MONEY (Money, 1974-07)
22. MAX (Max, 1975-01)
23. Ton, Ton, Onee-san.... (トン、トン、お姉さん)
24. Gokukan (極寒, Arctic Cold, 1981-05)
25. R (アール, R, 1981-02)
26. Umihebi to Hokuto Shichisei (海蛇と北斗七星, The Sea Snake And The Big Dipper, 1980-12)
27. Flight (フライト, Flight, 1980-03)

altTitles.ja: くまみこ

description.en: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

title.en: My Roommate Isn't From This World

altTitles.ja: 同居人がこの世のモンじゃない 連載版

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ga Konoyo no Mon janai Rensai-ban

altTitles.en: My Roommate Isn't Of This World - Serialized Version

altTitles.ru: Мой сосед по комнате не из этого мира

description.en:
The young man's new apartment is haunted, but as it turns out, even the dead have their own personal shortcomings… issues of the flesh included.    
For the dead have lingering desires, and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger, there's hate, there's curiosity… and there's love too.    
Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly, certainly desiring *something*…  
(No wonder the rent is cheap!)

Note: this is the serialized version of the Pixiv webcomic.
description.ja: 念願の一人暮らし。快適なオーディオライフ（アダルト）を満喫できる喜びに浸るのもつかの間・・・その部屋には「何か」がいた。SNS累計250万いいねを達成したトキメキ系ホラー、商業進出!!!

title.en: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero

altTitles.id: Menjadi Sultan untuk Menarik Gacha dan Ciptakan Tim Waifu Terkuat

altTitles.en: Spin Gacha, Recruit New Comrades, and Build The Strongest Army of Beautiful Girls!!

altTitles.ms: Tarik Gacha dan Buat Pasukan Gadis Cantik Terkuat untuk Bertarung Bersamamu

altTitles.en: Using Gacha to Increase My Companions and to Create the Strongest Girls’ Army Corps
You Increase Families and Make Beautiful Girl Army Corps, and put it up

altTitles.ru: Использование лотереи для усиления моих компаньонов и создания армейского корпуса сильнейших девушек

altTitles.ja: ガチャを回して仲間を増やす 最強の美少女軍団を作り上げろ

description.en:
For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does.  
The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone.  
It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters.  
He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.
description.ja: ごく普通のソシャゲ廃人・大倉平八はガチャでゲットしたURアイテム【異世界への招待状】を使用したことにより、異世界転移してしまった。転移した直後にモンスターに襲われ、完全に詰んだかにみえた平八であったが—— スマホのガチャから美少女ユニットが具現化して現れた!?可愛い（壊れ）ガチャキャラと行く異世界ファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.

altTitles.ja: 青春のアフター

description.en: Makoto Toba hates everyone in his class. Everyone except Sakura Toowa, an introverted high school girl who lives with her grandma and loves video games. But one day, Sakura disappears(?) right in front of Makoto. Makoto continues to visit the site of her disappearance on the anniversary for the next 16 years. That is, until Sakura comes back from the time slip she was stuck in, and to her not a moment has passed. Now at 32 with a girlfriend, Makoto has to take care of his 16-year-old childhood crush. What could possibly go wrong?

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

altTitles.ja: あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。
「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

altTitles.vi: Cô bé ấy là con quái vật mà tôi đã cứu lấy năm xưa

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.

description.en: The youth x love/hate suspense manga tells the story of an extreme cosplay account that a student secretly enjoys, and the student discovers that the true identity of the person on the cosplay account is a popular "gyaru/gal" in class.

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party—

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, the main character, set out to defeat the demon king.
But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.
All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Ms Shizuko, the mother of the hero, sold as a slave—??

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title.en: I Look Too Much Like The Boss And The World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance is so BOSS-like, Yet Everyone Believes it

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: まどか☆えんがわ

description.en: The very popular Madoka Magica four-panel comic *Madoka☆Engawa* has finally been published as manga volumes, engulfing readers of *Manga Time Kirara☆Magica* in a whirlpool of healing and laughter! Love and be healed by the unseen side of Madoka and her sisters, and you will surely join their veranda too.

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Vanadis Heart

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム 水星の魔 ヴァナディースハート

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo - Vanadis Heart

description.en: Five years have passed since the "Vanadies Incident" that denied all Gundams. The mobile suit, nicknamed "The Curse," runs across the earth. The first official side story manga of "The Witch of Mercury'' featuring Chika Tojo from "Tanjo Senki''!
description.ja: すべてのガンダムを否定した「ヴァナディース事変」から５年後――。“呪い”と称されたそのモビルスーツは、地球の大地を駆け巡る。『幼女戦記』の東條チカを迎えて贈る、『水星の魔女』初の公式外伝漫画！

title.en: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru

altTitles.en: There's a Ghost Behind the Gyaru

altTitles.ja: ギャルの背後に霊がいる

altTitles.en: The ghost is behind the gal

description.en: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.

altTitles.ja: バキ道

description.en: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.
description.ru: Продолжение серии манги Бойца Баки. После "победы" над воскрешённым "богом меча" Миямото Мусаси в этот раз история столкнёт главных персонажей с потомком "бога сумо" и его бандой сумоистов.
description.tr: 2000 yıldan fazla bir süre sonra, Nomi no Sukune'nin halefi doğuyor. Bu kez, Baki sumo tanrısına meydan okuyacak.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

The academy holds a chilling legend. 

"Neglect practice, become like ‘Luin Ardell."

Luin, the academy’s outcast, cursed with Mana Discharge Disability. But -

"You’re the chosen one, Draka’s harbinger of destruction."

After enduring ridicule for six years, finally, a new opportunity arises.
description.pt-br: 'Luin Ardell' Orador da turma da Academia Mágica Ignit Mais promissor que todo mundo. Mais diligente que todos os outros. Mais talentoso que qualquer outro mago. Isso é o que meu nome significava. Era isso que significava... Até meu aniversário de dez anos. "Você possui um caso raro de 'Transtorno de Evocação de Magia'." Uma maldição que transformou um 'Mago Gênio' que entrou na academia com as notas mais altas em um 'Aleijado Mágico'. Mas então, um milagre me encontrou. "Se não consigo evocar magia, só preciso socá-los!" Força opressiva, punhos amedrontadores, Um Talento Mágico Genial. "Nunca mais vou perder para ninguém."
